title: Nick Carter shares moment wife gives birth to second child
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Backstreet Boys star Nick Carter has shared a moving self-made video of his wife Lauren Kitt’s birth journey, after they welcomed their second child last week.

The pair were already parents to three-year-old son Odin, who also makes an appearance in the clip.

Nick captioned the video: ‘This was a little dad video that I made in iMovie on my phone day of Saoirse’s Birth.’

The video features Nick and Lauren heading into hospital, Lauren being wheeled into the delivery room and even the baby’s first cries after she arrived on 3 October.

Nick this week revealed he has named his daughter Saoirse Reign in tribute to his ‘warrior’ wife.

The I Want It That Way singer said on Instagram: ‘To my incredibly strong wife… For 2 years I watched you endure some of the hardest things a husband could ever witness.

Nick Carter shared this photo as he revealed his new baby’s name (Picture: Instagram/nickcarter)

‘Going through the ups and downs of pregnancy all in the hopes that just maybe, with a little help from up above, we would get to this point.

‘So on January 28th 2019 when I walked out of that bathroom with that positive test I already knew that Saoirse was coming back to us.’

Lauren and Nick last month (Picture: @nickcarter)

He added: ‘I just want to thank you for giving me the Life, Love and family that I always wanted. You are a true Warrior and I love you.’

Congrats both!
